Although the cultivator was a sedate man who was unafraid of death, he was still astounded when he saw Lu Ye. â€œWhy are you here?â€

Certainly, he remembered Lu Ye.

Around one to two years ago, when the Lost City of Xianyuan opened up, Lu Ye visited this place. At that time, the cultivator was turned into a Ghost Spirit by Amber, and he had been following Lu Ye around for quite a while.

These five Ghost Spirits respectively had their special skills. Their cultivation and moves were more powerful than those of the sentries.

During the previous trip to the Lost City of Xianyuan, Lu Ye had a high turnover rate of the sentries who followed him, but these five unique Ghost Spirits had been by his side for a long time.

When they eventually came across the City Lord, he cut off the connection between Amber and the Ghost Spirits.

At that time, Lu Ye felt that it was such a shame. Apart from a special environment such as the Lost City of Xianyuan, there was nowhere else where Amber could easily turn others into Ghost Spirits.

After all, Lu Ye had never seen other apparitions before other than Yi Yi in the outside world.

Now, this man, who was thought to be in the Divine Ocean Realm, was one of the five special Ghost Spirits back then, the Butcher!

Inside the house, the sentries were adjusting their breathing. They looked weary from the battle earlier, and some of their bodies no longer looked so solid.

It was apparent that they had exerted themselves. Apparitions were not made of flesh, after all. They were somewhere between virtual and real. They would appear thinner if they had spent too much energy, and in the worst-case scenario, they might become invisible and dissipate altogether.

Presently, Lu Ye was also an apparition, but unlike the others, he was able to consume Spirit Pills to replenish his Spiritual Power.

â€œWho is this, Sir?â€

When Lu Ye came into the building with the Butcher, these sentries were astonished.

The Lost City of Xianyuan was a large city with a lot of sentries, but having spent so many years together, they were familiar with each other, remembering all the faces. Therefore, it was a surprise that an unfamiliar face appeared all of a sudden.

Instead of explaining anything, the Butcher merely ordered, â€œGet some rest, for we have even more battles ahead of us!â€

Then, he led Lu Ye to the second floor.

When Lu Ye was out of sight, one sentry came to his senses and whispered, â€œI remember him. He was the one who killed me previously.â€ He was talking about the last time Lu Ye came to the Lost City of Xianyuan.

â€œHas the Hidden Realm opened up? No, I donâ€™t think so. There are signs every time the Hidden Realm opens up, and the time hasnâ€™t come yet. Moreover, during the period when the insectoids attack the city, the Hidden Realm isnâ€™t accessible to the Outsiders. How did he even come in?â€

â€œCompared to that, Iâ€™m more concerned about the anomaly during the battle earlier. Several insectoids were killing their companions as if they had been enslaved. Sir didnâ€™t ask us to destroy those insectoids either. It seems like that this guy was the one who controlled the insectoids.â€

â€œCan anyone do that in the world? Itâ€™s said that insectoids can never be enslaved.â€

â€œWho knows? Perhaps in this age, some people have invented a way to control the insectoids.â€

â€¦

The conversation between the sentries was fervent.

This was unlike the impression Lu Ye had of them.

As far as he was concerned, sentries were apparitions with low sentience. Even the squad leaders were inflexible. As such, he was impressed by the Butcher and the others, since apparitions like them behaved just like Humans.

Now, it seemed that besides the fact that the sentries were apparitions, they were no different from Humans.

The entire Lost City of Xianyuan seemed to be shrouded in a thick layer of mystery.

After the Butcher took Lu Ye to the second floor, he told him to have a seat and looked out the window for a while. Then, he turned around and looked at Lu Ye with a frown, asking, â€œAre you dead?â€

Lu Ye didnâ€™t expect to hear that kind of question. Despite his urge to roll his eyes, he shook his head and denied it. â€œNo.â€

â€œHow did you come in, then? The Hidden Realm supposedly hasnâ€™t opened up yet.â€

Only when the Hidden Realm opened up would there be a lot of Humans, just like what had happened previously. However, when the Hidden Realm was closed, the Humans would be chased out.

The same thing happened repeatedly over the years. There had never been a time when there were Outsiders while the Hidden Realm was closed.

Lu Ye replied, â€œI came here through the Mystic Fruit Seed.â€

â€œWhatâ€™s that?â€ The Butcher frowned. It was apparent that he had never heard of it.

Just as Lu Ye was ready to fish out the Mystic Fruit Seed, he recalled that he was now an apparition in this city. Although he had access to the things in his Storage Bag and Storage Sphere, he couldnâ€™t bring the seed, which was the key to the Rift of Illusions, with him. As such, he described what the seed looked like and explained its amazing uses instead.

The Butcher seemed to understand what Lu Ye was talking about, but he hadnâ€™t figured out why that thing could help a Human enter this city as an apparition. After giving it some thought, he formed some speculation.

If his speculation was right, it was not impossible that Lu Ye could enter the city.

In that case, there must be something special about the man before his eyes as an average person wouldnâ€™t receive such treatment.

â€œWhatâ€™s your name?â€ asked the Butcher.

â€œHavenâ€™t you been calling me Butcher? Just call me that.â€

Certainly, Lu Ye remembered calling him â€˜Butcherâ€™ when he was in the city previously, but he was hesitant to call him that again now.

Nonetheless, it didnâ€™t bother the Butcher one bit. â€œIâ€™m a Butcher in this city, so youâ€™re not wrong to call me that.â€ Suddenly recalling something, he told Lu Ye, â€œBut if you see that woman again, donâ€™t call her crybaby. Sheâ€™ll be displeased if she hears someone calls her that, and she will teach you a lesson.â€

Lu Ye was embarrassed upon hearing that.

Be it the cultivators of Thousand Demon Ridge or sentries, she could weaken their powers by 30 percent with the sounds of her pipa and her cries.

â€œHer name is Xi Wanying.â€

â€œIâ€™ll keep that in mind.â€ Lu Ye nodded with a solemn expression and told himself in secret that he had to call her Xi Wanying instead of crybaby.

An apprehensive Lu Ye asked, â€œSenior, how is Senior Xiâ€™s cultivation compared to yours?â€

â€œShe is more powerful than me.â€ The Butcherâ€™s words pulled Lu Ye out of his wishful thinking.

â€œSenior, what happened to all of you? Why are you guys so powerful now? The last time we met, you were only in the Spirit Creek Realm,â€ Lu Ye asked doubtfully. â€œAlso, what is it about the Lost City of Xianyuan? Why am I here all of a sudden?â€

The Butcher explained, â€œWhat you see might not be real when it comes to cultivation. When the Hidden Realm opened up previously, old farts like us decided to play a little game with you guys. The cultivation we showcase depends on how powerful all of you are.â€

â€œA little game?â€ Lu Ye was perplexed.

Therefore, the Butcher and the others presented themselves as cultivators in the same league, though they appeared to be slightly more powerful.
